title: Everything you need to know about IWCI

replies.body: IWCI and MSI will be huge for Wildcard Teams. Playing against others professional team will help them a lot and it's not like we expect any Wildcard team to be strong at MSI, but at least they can grow as a team. I wish I had a chance like that {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Razinek,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=LagMJWPs,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-20T19:43:40.949+0000)
>
> IWCI and MSI will be huge for Wildcard Teams. Playing against others professional team will help them a lot and it's not like we expect any Wildcard team to be strong at MSI, but at least they can grow as a team. I wish I had a chance like that {{item:3070}}

there is a chance. That is why they bring the wildcard. With EU looking so weak they have a good chance to make 4th even.
aww if you want to be pro you can do it ^^ maybe add me lol and we will go pro in 1.5 years i have a few slots open
hey riot, you should give a little more love to this, and at last put the program on your schedule on lolesport...

from what i read on http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/337qyy/where_will_the_wildcard_tournament_be_streamed/
streamed on twitch chanel 2 from riot
Chances are it'll be streamed on Twitch. Whether it will be on Riot's official channel i do not know, but I'd be very surprised if it wasn't streamed

Wildcard Invitational should have a name change to "International Punching Bag" though with Kabuum! winning vs Alliance in worlds, maybe them being there is for the "Rudy Effect".

:3
For once Vixxy, we agree lol

Shouldn't it be** International Wildcard Invitational**?

> There are many roads to the Mid Season Invitational in Florida, United States. For teams from the Wildcard Regions, it's through the** Invitational Wildcard Invitational**.
Congratulations you found the Typo! Your prize is a half moldy sammich and this flattened penny.
